title: A Dangerous Act of Kindness
description: Join Stanley the neurotic mouse, Hector the adventurous Chihuahua, and Sssylvia the rattlesnake in their many adventures in the desert. Be prepared to be on the edge of your seat as they confront spirits, bats, cliffs, and sleeping without feather beds or pillows in this exciting adventure of three amigos who discover the true meaning of bravery and friendship.
author: Lori Ziemba
